name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: IRyS introduces the 'Complete Set Purchase Bonus' items.
IRyS concludes the merchandise segment and transitions back to the concert.

subtitles.original: Say, I love P-suke-sensei's art.
subtitles.english: Say, I love P-suke-sensei's art.

subtitles.original: She has an amazing fashion sense.
subtitles.english: She has an amazing fashion sense.

subtitles.original: The outfits are always so peak.
subtitles.english: The outfits are always so peak.

subtitles.original: Just look at this sexy disco-style outfit.
subtitles.english: Just look at this sexy disco-style outfit.

subtitles.original: Yes, it's sexy, right? Yes, it's sexy.
subtitles.english: Yes, it's sexy, right? Yes, it's sexy.

subtitles.original: えーとね、まずは最初はこちら、コンサートポスタリスでございます。
subtitles.english: First off, here is the Concert PosteRyS.

subtitles.original: リアルライブのグッズとかで見たことあるかな？大きなポスターです。
subtitles.english: Have you seen this kind of thing as real live merch? It's a big poster.

subtitles.original: それをね、アイリスも作ってみたくて、今回P-suke先生に素敵な絵を描いてもらって、作っていただきました。
subtitles.english: I wanted to make one too, so I had P-suke-sensei draw a wonderful illustration for it.

subtitles.original: みんなどうかな？かわいいよね。
subtitles.english: What do you all think? It's cute, right?

subtitles.original: And next...
subtitles.english: And next...

subtitles.original: We have the Concert T-ShirtRyS.
subtitles.english: We have the Concert T-ShirtRyS.

subtitles.original: It's my first time releasing a T-shirt, if we don't count the Omacat ones.
subtitles.english: It's my first time releasing a T-shirt, if we don't count the Omacat ones.

subtitles.original: You need to have a T-shirt for a live concert, of course, right?
subtitles.english: You need to have a T-shirt for a live concert, of course, right?

subtitles.original: I know we're not at an in-person venue,
subtitles.english: I know we're not at an in-person venue,

subtitles.original: but I hope you buy a shirt as a memento of this 3D live and you can wear it for future stuff, future events, yeah!
subtitles.english: but I hope you buy a shirt as a memento of this 3D live and you can wear it for future stuff, future events, yeah!

subtitles.original: 今回の3Dライブの思い出に買ってもらえると嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: I hope you'll buy it as a memory of this 3D live.

subtitles.original: And we still have more!
subtitles.english: And we still have more!

subtitles.original: The third item is the BackpackRyS.
subtitles.english: The third item is the BackpackRyS.

subtitles.original: I love the little details in the design, like the zipper charm and the lining.
subtitles.english: I love the little details in the design, like the zipper charm and the lining.

subtitles.original: Yeah, it's like a bigger version of the shoulder bagRyS, which I think a lot of you guys liked.
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's like a bigger version of the shoulder bagRyS, which I think a lot of you guys liked.

subtitles.original: I put a lot of thought into all of this, and it's perfect for carrying all of your IRyS merch!
subtitles.english: I put a lot of thought into all of this, and it's perfect for carrying all of your IRyS merch!

subtitles.original: ぜひね、イベントやライブなどで使ってね。もうめっちゃかっこいいんで。ぜひぜひぜひ。
subtitles.english: Please use it at events and concerts. It's really cool, so definitely check it out.

subtitles.original: And finally...
subtitles.english: And finally...

subtitles.original: We have the YabaiRyS Keychain!
subtitles.english: We have the YabaiRyS Keychain!

subtitles.original: I know you guys, and me personally, have all been wanting a doll that has this face.
subtitles.english: I know you guys, and me personally, have all been wanting a doll that has this face.

subtitles.original: Look at it. She's so cute. I wonder what she's thinking about.
subtitles.english: Look at it. She's so cute. I wonder what she's thinking about.

subtitles.original: Surely, 'seiso' thoughts. When you press her, she makes a sound.
subtitles.english: Surely, 'seiso' thoughts. When you press her, she makes a sound.

subtitles.original: Surely, a 'seiso' sound. Um, you can put her on your BackpackRyS and take her everywhere with you.
subtitles.english: Surely, a 'seiso' sound. Um, you can put her on your BackpackRyS and take her everywhere with you.

subtitles.original: ヤバいことが起きても、ヤバリスが何とかしてくれることないかも...
subtitles.english: Even if something bad happens, YabaiRyS might not be able to help...

subtitles.original: まあ、この顔なんでね。うん。
subtitles.english: Well, look at that face. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Anyways, the full set will include the backstage pass style card.
subtitles.english: Anyways, the full set will include the backstage pass style card.

subtitles.original: I'll be hand-signing the limited edition set, and the regular set will be foil-stamped, as per usual.
subtitles.english: I'll be hand-signing the limited edition set, and the regular set will be foil-stamped, as per usual.

subtitles.original: フルセット買っていただくと特典でスタッフパス風カードがついていきまーす。
subtitles.english: If you buy the full set, you'll get a staff pass style card as a bonus.

subtitles.original: えっと、数量限定版にはアイリスの直筆サイン、通常版のフルセットには箔押し複製サインがつきます。
subtitles.english: The limited edition set comes with my handwritten signature, and the regular full set comes with a foil-stamped replica signature.

subtitles.original: お間違い無いように。アイリスの汚い字みたいよね。なので、お急ぎ。
subtitles.english: Don't mix them up. You want to see my messy handwriting, right? So hurry up.

subtitles.original: And that's not all!
subtitles.english: And that's not all!

subtitles.original: Every set will include a special Oshi-holo-men card for the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME!
subtitles.english: Every set will include a special Oshi-holo-men card for the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME!

subtitles.original: You can only get this promo card if you buy the full set.
subtitles.english: You can only get this promo card if you buy the full set.

subtitles.original: Yeah, and surely, it's IRyS's card, it must have like absolutely amazing stats.
subtitles.english: Yeah, and surely, it's IRyS's card, it must have like absolutely amazing stats.

subtitles.original: Yeah, surely, surely. Um, if you haven't played yet, you can check out the card details...
subtitles.english: Yeah, surely, surely. Um, if you haven't played yet, you can check out the card details...

subtitles.original: and how to play on the official card game homepage, so be sure to check it out!
subtitles.english: and how to play on the official card game homepage, so be sure to check it out!

subtitles.original: さらに、さらに、フルセット特典がもう一つあります。
subtitles.english: And there's even more! Another full set bonus.

subtitles.original: hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAMEで使用できるカードが1枚つきます。
subtitles.english: You'll get one card that can be used in the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME.

subtitles.original: フルセットを購入した人だけの特別な推しホロメンカードです。
subtitles.english: It's a special Oshi-holo-men card only for those who purchase the full set.

subtitles.original: まだ遊んだことない人は、ホームページでカードの詳細や遊び方を、確認できるから、ぜひチェックしてみてね。
subtitles.english: If you haven't played yet, you can find card details and instructions on the website, so be sure to check it out!

subtitles.original: もうアイリスのカードだから絶対めっちゃ強いと思います。
subtitles.english: It's my card, so I'm sure it's incredibly strong.

subtitles.original: And that's all for the merch announcements.
subtitles.english: And that's all for the merch announcements.

subtitles.original: Merch sales will open after the main part of the live.
subtitles.english: Merch sales will open after the main part of the live.

subtitles.original: このあとカートオープンだよ！
subtitles.english: The cart will open right after this!

subtitles.original: I still have another big announcement coming up, so please stay until the end!
subtitles.english: I still have another big announcement coming up, so please stay until the end!

subtitles.original: I can't wait to share it with you, man.
subtitles.english: I can't wait to share it with you, man.

subtitles.original: ライブ後半にも重大告知、発表がまだあります。
subtitles.english: There's still a major announcement coming up in the second half of the live.

subtitles.original: ライブもまだまだ続くから、最後まで盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: The live is still going, so let's keep the energy up until the end!

subtitles.original: Yeah, we're already halfway... Oh, the next song is starting.
subtitles.english: Yeah, we're already halfway... Oh, the next song is starting.

subtitles.original: Okay, I gotta go, I gotta go!
subtitles.english: Okay, I gotta go, I gotta go!

subtitles.original: Break it out! Come back at once!
subtitles.english: Break it out! Come back at once!

subtitles.original: 理想、満足してた 少しの希望だけで
subtitles.english: I was satisfied with ideals, With just a little bit of hope

subtitles.original: 待ってれば誰かが未来 決めてくれていた
subtitles.english: Someone was deciding the future for me While I waited

subtitles.original: Just make it out, come back it once!
subtitles.english: Just make it out, come back it once!

subtitles.original: なんて小さい自分なんだろう Burst it out!
subtitles.english: How small am I? Burst it out!

subtitles.original: You know you gotta move it up and break it!
subtitles.english: You know you gotta move it up and break it!

subtitles.original: 今すぐ夢まで走ろう
subtitles.english: Let's run towards our dreams right now

subtitles.original: Wake up, make it out, are you lucky time? Hands up!
subtitles.english: Wake up, make it out, are you lucky time? Hands up!

subtitles.original: Rock and roll!
subtitles.english: Rock and roll!

subtitles.original: Gamble, you gotta chance to make a rumble!
subtitles.english: Gamble, you gotta chance to make a rumble!
